featured.text: They are also used on ships and spacecraft for their greater structural integrity.

definition.zh_def: 誠實和道德的品質，尤其是在面對困難時保持一致的原則和價值觀。
definition.en_def: The quality of being honest and having strong moral principles; the state of being whole and undivided.
definition.example: She is known for her integrity and always stands up for what is right.
